review: Roku is better. The Fire TV Stick has to be in line of sight to the router and I can't load Netflix. Wish I would have bought another Roku.
author: Maxwell

review: This gadget is awesome and easy to use.  Highly  recommended.
author: Mario Cordova

review: It was easy to set up and really easy to use
author: Catrina "Catrina"

review: Works well.  Wish I could remove icons I don't use.
author: Mike Weaver

review: So easy to set up and use!  Goodbye forever, cable tv!
author: Katherine Parton

review: love it great movies all my music and photos automatically downloaded all i had to do was plug it up and follow a few prompts
author: samuel hill

review: My dinosaur-era TV recently died, so I decided to get a "state of the art" smart TV. Since I'm a Prime member I bought the Fire Stick so I could stream movies for free. I'm happy to say that it works perfectly with Prime and Netflix. Very happy with this purchase!
author: Jamee
